name: Magic Coins-Click Fun
description:
Magic Coins is easy to play, once you start, you can’t stop!
Very suitable for killing time and decompression.

Features
● Merge gameplay: Use small coin and synthesize bigger and prettier ones! Simple and fun, but also requires a little skill and luck!
● Lovely Coins: A rich variety of coins, each with its own unique style.
● No time limit：enjoy the game in relaxing time
● Challenge the record: Synthesize your own perfect coins, keep breaking the highest score and challenge the global ranking!

You can download and play the game for free now! Come on!
